text:
Need help, food people in Japan. I just got my grocery delivery and I left it out. Forgot this bacon was in it. Must have been at room temp for ~4 hours. Is it safe to cook and eat or toss it? 

#food #quarantine #ベーコン #食べ物 #help https://t.co/hNAxxOAgUG
